description:
Whatever's next on your to-do list, these versatile pants keep up. The Aphrodite joggers are built for days on the go. Great for travel they offer comfortable stretch, a DWR finish and solid UV protection.

  • Herringbone nylon blend dries quickly, has a mechanical 4-way stretch and packs well
  • PFC-free DWR finish sheds showers, dirt and grime
  • FlashDry™ improves wicking and further reduces drying times
  • UPF 40+ rating blocks more than 95% of harsh UV
  • Elastic encased waistband and an internal drawcord let you customize the fit
  • Plenty of pocket space, plus a hidden zippered pocket for valuables
  • Regular fit feels just like you hoped they would
name: The North Face Aphrodite Jogger - Women's
